history.history1: Dar Rashm Publishing House has been a shining star in the Saudi Arabian literary sky since 2019.
history.history2: Setting new standards of excellence in the publishing world. Embracing a deeply rooted philosophy, the publishing house strives to foster a culture of knowledge and intellectual exchange through carefully curated, meaningful content.
history.history3: Embarking on a rich creative journey, Dar Rashm navigates with quality as its compass and innovation as its rudder.

department1.title: Translation
department1.text: We provide high-quality translation services to and from various languages. Our team of professional translators with extensive experience ensures the accuracy, clarity, and fluency of all translations. We offer translation services for books, documents, reports, websites, marketing materials, and more.

department2.title: Proofreading
department2.text: We elevate your writing to a new level of professionalism. Our team of expert linguistic editors ensures that your texts are free from grammatical, spelling, and stylistic errors, making your writing clear, compelling, and effective.

department3.title: Creative editing
department3.text: We offer specialized creative editing services to help you enhance your novels, short stories, poetry, and scripts. We strive to understand your artistic vision and provide constructive feedback to improve your work. Our goal is to assist you in reaching your full creative potential.

department4.title: Literary agency authors
department4.text: Extensive experience in the publishing world. Our team of literary agency professionals have the experience and knowledge to help you achieve your publishing goals.

department5.title: Marketing
department5.text: We offer marketing services to help you promote your writing and increase its sales. We work with you to develop an effective marketing campaign that reaches your target audience.

department6.title: Content writing
department6.text: We provide high-quality content writing services for websites, blogs, social media, and marketing materials. Our team of professional writers write engaging, informative content that captures the attention of your target audience and achieves your marketing goals.

department7.title: Book Production
department7.text: We offer comprehensive book production services that meet all your needs, from typesetting and layout of text to designing distinctive covers that will attract readers.

overlayImg.title: About Rashm
overlayImg.text: Rashm is a leading Saudi publishing house founded in 2019 in Arar, North Borders, Saudi Arabia.

aims.title: Our mission is to
aims.aim1: Enrich the Arabic library with purposeful and diverse publications in various fields, focusing on Arabic literature in its various forms, scientific and intellectual books, children's books, and personal development books
aims.aim2: Discover and support new literary talents by publishing their first works and providing them with publishing opportunities.
aims.aim3: Contribute to the spread of Arab culture by participating in Arab and international book fairs, and organizing cultural and literary events.
